at the very least is a license file a read me on how
it works and then any of the binaries that you're going to be copying
and so you can put this as a tar file or a zip file and
and host it somewhere and that that becomes your crew
package that crew will go and grab and then drop onto the
nodes so at the very least those are three things that you need to have
um the the next part is the crew manifest this doesn't go
inside the the package it goes um actually in part of the crew
the crew index which is where uh everything is queried from uh and so this manifest is just to be ammo
you add information like the meta metadata for the name um the version the
home page um and then what platforms so this is how crew manages the platforms um that are
uh that it unpacks for uh so you can specify you know if you match this
um particular platform in this architecture uh and this is where you go and get the
